properties.displayName: Public network access should be disabled for App Services and Function Apps
properties.description: Disabling public network access improves security by ensuring that the App Service is not exposed on the public internet. Creating private endpoints can limit exposure of an App Service. Learn more at: https://aka.ms/app-service-private-endpoint.

metadata.description: 'Audit' allows a non-compliant resource to be created, but flags it as non-compliant. 'Deny' blocks the resource creation. 'Disable' turns off the policy.
